summary: 2000 DODGE NEON  I  HAD THIS DODGE NEON FOR 3 YEARS NOW ; I FOUND OUT THE OTHER DAY THAT I HAVE TO REPLACE MY HEAD GASKET, FUEL PUMP AND TIMING BELT.  I KNOW I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO REPLACE THESE ITEMS SO SOON.  I TOOK MY CAR TO ANOTHER MECHANIC AND THEY TOLD ME THE SAME EXACT THING.  I AM TRULY UPSET ABOUT THIS.
